messages.message: nice! I followed the instructions and was able to get this working again

I try to do that and it's not working for me :slightly_smiling_face:

It lets me in, but produces errors that trial has ended
@demetr.starshov seems unrelated. You can subscribe thru the UI

cs up```
The trial expired issue is not related to this. You can subscribe thru the UI via Settings > Subscription & Billing
